{{title|swap{{small|(std::mdspan)}}}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
friend constexpr void swap( mdspan&amp; x, mdspan&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}

Overloads the {{ltt|cpp/utility/swap|std::swap}} algorithm for {{rlpt|/|std::mdspan}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|x}} with that of {{c|y}}. Equivalent to:

{{box|
{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/swap}}{{c/core|(x.}}{{rlpsi|/#acc_}}{{c/core|, y.}}{{rlpsi|/#acc_}}{{c/core|);}}&lt;br&gt;
{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/swap}}{{c/core|(x.}}{{rlpsi|/#map_}}{{c/core|, y.}}{{rlpsi|/#map_}}{{c/core|);}}&lt;br&gt;
{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/swap}}{{c/core|(x.}}{{rlpsi|/#ptr_}}{{c/core|, y.}}{{rlpsi|/#ptr_}}{{c/core|);}}
}}

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::mdspan}}}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x, y|{{rlpt|/|mdspan}} objects whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
